title._content: Image taken from page 414 of '[The Celt, the Roman, and the Saxon: a history of the early inhabitants of Britain, down to the Conversion of the Anglo-Saxons to Christianity. Illustrated by the ancient remains brought to light by recent research.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Celt, the Roman, and the Saxon: a history of the early inhabitants of Britain, down to the Conversion of the Anglo-Saxons to Christianity. Illustrated by the ancient remains brought to light by recent research.]" Author: Wright, Thomas Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1325.d.17." Page: 414 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1861 Publisher: Arthur Hall, Virtue & Co Edition: Second edition. Carefully revised, with additions. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003984678 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
